subject: Order SSN2828 - Shipping refund
description_text:
Hi Simsonn team

I purchased for my son a set of Simsonn Plus X pedals and paid for express shipping. The express shipping would have meant that it should have been delivered yesterday (Tuesday 14th Oct).

When I track the package I can see that it is still in China and looks like it’s not going to arrive any time soon.

Can you therefore please refund the £23.00 that I paid for express shipping.

I have attached our order receipt where you can see that we placed the order on October 3rd.

Please let me know if you require any further information from me.

Kindest wishes

Carlos Martos
